desc: Garden Pine Design cape cod chairs (also known as adirondack chairs) are a classic design with a curved back and a rolled over seat front that provide great comfort and wide arms to sit your drink on. What better way to enjoy a sunny day?

layout.text: 100% NEW ZEALAND OWNED AND OPERATED FOR OVER 25 YEARS
Classic, handcrafted, high quality New Zealand materials
We supply direct to our customers. Our products stand the test of time with all of our timber treated to H3 standard
